title: Shining a flashlight reveals the conic sections - circles,...
description: Shining a flashlight reveals the conic sections - circles, ellipses, parabolas and hyperbolas. I’ve been working on an interactive visualization of this that uses the orientation of your phone to aim the flashlight. Please try it out by visiting this link! Can you get a parabola from intersecting the cone of light with the plane below? [code] [link]
